title: Knowledge Sharing and Collaboration Strategies in Smart Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and understanding of social interactions
context.additional_context: A collaboration-based learning course for learners preparing for professional careers in medical, legal, or technical fields, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can search for and curate knowledge content reflecting geo-spatial contexts in smart learning environments
Learners can share knowledge and perform collaborative content creation processes with peers using LMS-based collaboration tools
Learners can analyze the connectivity structure of digital knowledge resources by applying the Open Graph metadata framework

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
